entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of wet snow mixed with rain. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of wet snow or rain overnight. Wind light except north 40 km/h over southern sections late this evening and overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of wet snow or rain early in the morning. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind light except southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 over southern sections in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
